core

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckersComputerPlayer

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player defines the player of any game and tracks name, id, game pieces, wins, losses, and draws.
